VFECore.Abilities.AbilityDef.label: Manifest Mechlink
VFECore.Abilities.AbilityDef.description: Uses the power of the psylink to create a mechlink.

VFECore.Abilities.AbilityDef.label: Summon Militor
VFECore.Abilities.AbilityDef.description: Hack a distant mechanoid factory to produce a Militor and skip it directly to you. Bandwidth Cost: 1

VFECore.Abilities.AbilityDef.label: Engage Stealth
VFECore.Abilities.AbilityDef.description: Psychically shroud the mechanoid in light-refracting archites, causing it to become virtually invisible. The process cannot be sustained for long though.

VFECore.Abilities.AbilityDef.label: Precept: Ambush
VFECore.Abilities.AbilityDef.description: Psychically hack an experimental ambush precept into a mechanoid, causing it to go invisible until an offensive action is taken. Very effective on worker models, allowing them to continue work while staying mostly undetected.

VFECore.Abilities.AbilityDef.label: Summon Scyther
VFECore.Abilities.AbilityDef.description: Hack a distant mechanoid factory to produce a Scyther and skip it directly to you. Bandwidth Cost: 2

VFECore.Abilities.AbilityDef.label: Summon Lancer
VFECore.Abilities.AbilityDef.description: Hack a distant mechanoid factory to produce a Lancer and skip it directly to you. Bandwidth Cost: 3

VFECore.Abilities.AbilityDef.label: Summon Scorcher
VFECore.Abilities.AbilityDef.description: Hack a distant mechanoid factory to produce a Scorcher and skip it directly to you. Bandwidth Cost: 1

VFECore.Abilities.AbilityDef.label: Optimize Mech
VFECore.Abilities.AbilityDef.description: Psychically rewrite the code of the mechanoid's internal subroutines to remove unnecessary safety measures, allowing the mechanoid to move and fight faster.

VFECore.Abilities.AbilityDef.label: Reinforce Mech
VFECore.Abilities.AbilityDef.description: Psychically enchant the mechanoid's component with a low energy archite field that reduces the amount of damage taken upon being hit.

VFECore.Abilities.AbilityDef.label: Epsilon Shutdown
VFECore.Abilities.AbilityDef.description: Psychically hack a mechanoid to shut it off.

VFECore.Abilities.AbilityDef.label: Summon Tesseron
VFECore.Abilities.AbilityDef.description: Hack a distant mechanoid factory to produce a Tesseron and skip it directly to you. Bandwidth Cost: 3

VFECore.Abilities.AbilityDef.label: Summon Pikeman
VFECore.Abilities.AbilityDef.description: Hack a distant mechanoid factory to produce a Pikeman and skip it directly to you. Bandwidth Cost: 2

VFECore.Abilities.AbilityDef.label: Summon Centipede (Blaster)
VFECore.Abilities.AbilityDef.description: Hack a distant mechanoid factory to produce a Centipede blaster and skip it directly to you. Bandwidth Cost: 4

VFECore.Abilities.AbilityDef.label: Summon Diabolus
VFECore.Abilities.AbilityDef.description: Hack a distant mechanoid ship to produce a Diabolus and skip it directly to you. Bandwidth Cost: 5

VFECore.Abilities.AbilityDef.label: Summon War Queen
VFECore.Abilities.AbilityDef.description: Hack a distant mechanoid ship to produce a War Queen and skip it directly to you. Bandwidth Cost: 5

VFECore.Abilities.AbilityDef.label: Summon Apocriton
VFECore.Abilities.AbilityDef.description: Hack a distant mechanoid ship to produce an Apocriton and skip it directly to you. Bandwidth Cost: 2

VFECore.Abilities.AbilityDef.label: Project Omega: Inferno
VFECore.Abilities.AbilityDef.description: Hack a distant mechanoid factory to produce an inferno auto turret and skip it directly to you.

VFECore.Abilities.AbilityDef.label: Project Zeta: Charge
VFECore.Abilities.AbilityDef.description: Hack a distant mechanoid factory to produce a charge blaster auto turret and skip it directly to you.

VFECore.Abilities.AbilityDef.label: Project Alpha: Mortar
VFECore.Abilities.AbilityDef.description: Hack a distant mechanoid factory to produce an auto mortar and skip it directly to you.

VFECore.Abilities.AbilityDef.label: Mechanitor Precept: Apocritia
VFECore.Abilities.AbilityDef.description: Uses the power of the psylink to upgrade the mechlink for a duration of 24hrs, granting you the ability to resurrect any mechanoid during that time.

VFECore.Abilities.AbilityDef.label: Mechanitor Precept: Total Conversion
VFECore.Abilities.AbilityDef.description: Strip the mechanoid's systems out of the grasp of the mech-hive, the mechanoid will be bound to the caster if the latter has a mechlink.

VFECore.Abilities.AbilityDef.label: Psy-Mechlink upgrade
VFECore.Abilities.AbilityDef.description: Uses the power of the psylink to upgrade the mechlink granting you +10 Bandwidth and +1 additional control group per cast up to 10 times.

VFECore.Abilities.AbilityDef.label: Mechanoid Factory Override
VFECore.Abilities.AbilityDef.description: Hack a distant mechanoid factory to produce any mechanoid of your choosing and skip the selected amount to your location.

VFECore.Abilities.AbilityDef.label: Summon Cleansweeper
VFECore.Abilities.AbilityDef.description: Hack a distant mechanoid factory to produce a Cleansweeper and skip it directly to you. Bandwidth Cost: 1

VFECore.Abilities.AbilityDef.label: Summon Constructoid
VFECore.Abilities.AbilityDef.description: Hack a distant mechanoid factory to produce a Constructoid and skip it directly to you. Bandwidth Cost: 1

VFECore.Abilities.AbilityDef.label: Summon Lifter
VFECore.Abilities.AbilityDef.description: Hack a distant mechanoid factory to produce a Lifter and skip it directly to you. Bandwidth Cost: 1

VFECore.Abilities.AbilityDef.label: Summon Paramedic
VFECore.Abilities.AbilityDef.description: Hack a distant mechanoid factory to produce a paramedic and skip it directly to you. Bandwidth Cost: 1

VFECore.Abilities.AbilityDef.label: Summon Fabricor
VFECore.Abilities.AbilityDef.description: Hack a distant mechanoid factory to produce a Fabricor and skip it directly to you. Bandwidth Cost: 1

VFECore.Abilities.AbilityDef.label: Summon Tunneler
VFECore.Abilities.AbilityDef.description: Hack a distant mechanoid factory to produce a Tunneler and skip it directly to you. Bandwidth Cost: 3

VFECore.Abilities.AbilityDef.label: Summon Agrihand
VFECore.Abilities.AbilityDef.description: Hack a distant mechanoid ship to produce an Agrihand and skip it directly to you. Bandwidth Cost: 1

VFECore.Abilities.AbilityDef.label: Recharge Mech
VFECore.Abilities.AbilityDef.description: Reactivate the chemicals present within the mechanoid's battery to recharge it.

VFECore.Abilities.AbilityDef.label: Assisted Control
VFECore.Abilities.AbilityDef.description: Permanently halves the bandwidth cost of the target mechanoid.

VFECore.Abilities.AbilityDef.label: Precept: Blink
VFECore.Abilities.AbilityDef.description: Generate a miniature skipgate within the target creature, allowing automatic teleportation during their work.\n\nUse on organic targets is possible but not recommended due to the experimental nature of this precept.

VFECore.Abilities.AbilityDef.label: Summon Work Queen
VFECore.Abilities.AbilityDef.description: Hack a distant mechanoid factory to produce a Work Queen unit and skip it directly to you. Bandwidth Cost: 4

VFECore.Abilities.AbilityDef.label: Summon Progenitor
VFECore.Abilities.AbilityDef.description: Hack a distant mechanoid factory to produce a Progenitor unit and skip it directly to you. Bandwidth Cost: 1

VFECore.Abilities.AbilityDef.label: Summon Advanced Agrihand
VFECore.Abilities.AbilityDef.description: Hack a distant mechanoid factory to produce an Advanced Agrihand and skip it directly to you. Bandwidth Cost: 2

VFECore.Abilities.AbilityDef.label: Summon Advanced Cleansweeper
VFECore.Abilities.AbilityDef.description: Hack a distant mechanoid ship to produce an Advanced Cleansweeper and skip it directly to you. Bandwidth Cost: 1

VFECore.Abilities.AbilityDef.label: Summon Advanced Constructoid
VFECore.Abilities.AbilityDef.description: Hack a distant mechanoid factory to produce an Advanced Constructoid and skip it directly to you. Bandwidth Cost: 2

VFECore.Abilities.AbilityDef.label: Summon Advanced Lifter
VFECore.Abilities.AbilityDef.description: Hack a distant mechanoid factory to produce an Advanced Lifter and skip it directly to you. Bandwidth Cost: 1

VFECore.Abilities.AbilityDef.label: Summon Advanced Tunneler
VFECore.Abilities.AbilityDef.description: Hack a distant mechanoid factory to produce an Advanced Tunneler and skip it directly to you. Bandwidth Cost: 5

VFECore.Abilities.AbilityDef.label: Summon Advanced Fabricor
VFECore.Abilities.AbilityDef.description: Hack a distant mechanoid factory to produce an Advanced Fabricor and skip it directly to you. Bandwidth Cost: 2

VFECore.Abilities.AbilityDef.label: Summon Advanced Paramedic
VFECore.Abilities.AbilityDef.description: Hack a distant mechanoid factory to produce an Advanced Paramedic and skip it directly to you. Bandwidth Cost: 2

VFECore.Abilities.AbilityDef.label: Summon Falcon
VFECore.Abilities.AbilityDef.description: Hack a distant automatroid factory to produce a Falcon and skip it directly to you. Bandwidth Cost: 1

VFECore.Abilities.AbilityDef.label: Summon Noctula
VFECore.Abilities.AbilityDef.description: Hack a distant automatroid factory to produce a Noctula and skip it directly to you. Bandwidth Cost: 3

VFECore.Abilities.AbilityDef.label: Summon Dogge
VFECore.Abilities.AbilityDef.description: Hack a distant automatroid factory to produce a Dogge and skip it directly to you. Bandwidth Cost: 2

VFECore.Abilities.AbilityDef.label: Summon Arquebusier
VFECore.Abilities.AbilityDef.description: Hack a distant automatroid factory to produce a Cleansweeper and skip it directly to you. Bandwidth Cost: 2

VFECore.Abilities.AbilityDef.label: Summon Ronin
VFECore.Abilities.AbilityDef.description: Hack a distant automatroid factory to produce a Ronin and skip it directly to you. Bandwidth Cost: 3

VFECore.Abilities.AbilityDef.label: Summon Lady
VFECore.Abilities.AbilityDef.description: Hack a distant automatroid factory to produce an Lady and skip it directly to you. Bandwidth Cost: 3

VFECore.Abilities.AbilityDef.label: Summon Geochelone
VFECore.Abilities.AbilityDef.description: Hack a distant automatroid factory to produce a Geochelone and skip it directly to you. Bandwidth Cost: 5

VFECore.Abilities.AbilityDef.label: Summon Killdozer
VFECore.Abilities.AbilityDef.description: Hack a distant automatroid factory to produce a Killdozer and skip it directly to you. Bandwidth Cost: 7

VFECore.Abilities.AbilityDef.label: Summon Caretta
VFECore.Abilities.AbilityDef.description: Hack a distant automatroid factory to produce a Caretta and skip it directly to you. Bandwidth Cost: 5

VFECore.Abilities.AbilityDef.label: Summon Iguana
VFECore.Abilities.AbilityDef.description: Hack a distant automatroid factory to produce an Iguana and skip it directly to you. Bandwidth Cost: 4

VFECore.Abilities.AbilityDef.label: Summon Gecko
VFECore.Abilities.AbilityDef.description: Hack a distant automatroid factory to produce a Gecko and skip it directly to you. Bandwidth Cost: 4

VFECore.Abilities.AbilityDef.label: Summon Tarbosaurus
VFECore.Abilities.AbilityDef.description: Hack a distant automatroid factory to produce a Tarbosaurus and skip it directly to you. Bandwidth Cost: 8

VFECore.Abilities.AbilityDef.label: Summon Aura
VFECore.Abilities.AbilityDef.description: Hack a distant mechanoid factory to produce an Aura and skip it directly to you. Bandwidth Cost: 3

VFECore.Abilities.AbilityDef.label: Summon Daggersnout
VFECore.Abilities.AbilityDef.description: Hack a distant mechanoid factory to produce a Daggersnout and skip it directly to you. Bandwidth Cost: 1

VFECore.Abilities.AbilityDef.label: Summon Fireworm
VFECore.Abilities.AbilityDef.description: Hack a distant mechanoid factory to produce a Fireworm and skip it directly to you. Bandwidth Cost: 4

VFECore.Abilities.AbilityDef.label: Summon Phalanx
VFECore.Abilities.AbilityDef.description: Hack a distant mechanoid factory to produce a Phalanx and skip it directly to you. Bandwidth Cost: 4

VFECore.Abilities.AbilityDef.description: Hack a distant mechanoid factory to produce an Apoptosis and skip it directly to you. Bandwidth Cost: 5

VFECore.Abilities.AbilityDef.label: Summon Harpy
VFECore.Abilities.AbilityDef.description: Hack a distant mechanoid factory to produce an Harpy and skip it directly to you. Bandwidth Cost: 1

VFECore.Abilities.AbilityDef.label: Summon Gremlin
VFECore.Abilities.AbilityDef.description: Hack a distant mechanoid factory to produce a Gremlin and skip it directly to you. Bandwidth Cost: 1

VFECore.Abilities.AbilityDef.label: Summon Marshal
VFECore.Abilities.AbilityDef.description: Hack a distant mechanoid factory to produce a Marshal and skip it directly to you. Bandwidth Cost: 2

VFECore.Abilities.AbilityDef.label: Summon Ranger
VFECore.Abilities.AbilityDef.description: Hack a distant mechanoid factory to produce a Ranger and skip it directly to you. Bandwidth Cost: 2

VFECore.Abilities.AbilityDef.label: Summon Behemoth
VFECore.Abilities.AbilityDef.description: Hack a distant mechanoid factory to produce a Behemoth and skip it directly to you. Bandwidth Cost: 3

VFECore.Abilities.AbilityDef.label: Summon Sentinel
VFECore.Abilities.AbilityDef.description: Hack a distant mechanoid factory to produce a Sentinel and skip it directly to you. Bandwidth Cost: 3

VFECore.Abilities.AbilityDef.label: Summon Locust
VFECore.Abilities.AbilityDef.description: Hack a distant mechanoid factory to produce a Locust and skip it directly to you. Bandwidth Cost: 5

VFECore.Abilities.AbilityDef.label: Summon Wraith
VFECore.Abilities.AbilityDef.description: Hack a distant mechanoid factory to produce a Wraith and skip it directly to you. Bandwidth Cost: 5

VFECore.Abilities.AbilityDef.label: Summon Pawn I
VFECore.Abilities.AbilityDef.description: Hack a distant mechanoid factory to produce a Pawn I unit and skip it directly to you. Bandwidth Cost: 3

VFECore.Abilities.AbilityDef.label: Summon Knight I
VFECore.Abilities.AbilityDef.description: Hack a distant mechanoid factory to produce a Knight I unit and skip it directly to you. Bandwidth Cost: 4

VFECore.Abilities.AbilityDef.label: Summon Pawn II
VFECore.Abilities.AbilityDef.description: Hack a distant mechanoid factory to produce a Pawn II unit and skip it directly to you. Bandwidth Cost: 3

VFECore.Abilities.AbilityDef.label: Milian Charge
VFECore.Abilities.AbilityDef.description: Raises the consciousness and movement speed of nearby mechs.

VFECore.Abilities.AbilityDef.label: Summon Knight II
VFECore.Abilities.AbilityDef.description: Hack a distant mechanoid factory to produce a Knight II unit and skip it directly to you. Bandwidth Cost: 5

VFECore.Abilities.AbilityDef.label: Summon Guard
VFECore.Abilities.AbilityDef.description: Hack a distant mechanoid factory to produce a Guard unit and skip it directly to you. Bandwidth Cost: 4

VFECore.Abilities.AbilityDef.label: Summon Outrider
VFECore.Abilities.AbilityDef.description: Hack a distant mechanoid factory to produce an Outrider unit and skip it directly to you. Bandwidth Cost: 7

VFECore.Abilities.AbilityDef.label: Summon Captain
VFECore.Abilities.AbilityDef.description: Hack a distant mechanoid factory to produce a Captain unit and skip it directly to you. Bandwidth Cost: 6

VFECore.Abilities.AbilityDef.label: Summon Paladin
VFECore.Abilities.AbilityDef.description: Hack a distant mechanoid factory to produce a Paladin unit and skip it directly to you. Bandwidth Cost: 7

VFECore.Abilities.AbilityDef.label: Tuning: Pawn
VFECore.Abilities.AbilityDef.description: Tune every owned mechanoid of the target's model to the Pawn class, reducing aiming time while increasing manipulation. Additional casts will raise the tuning level by 1 up to a maximum of 4.

VFECore.Abilities.AbilityDef.label: Tuning: Knight
VFECore.Abilities.AbilityDef.description: Tune every owned mechanoid of the target's model into the Knight class, granting enhanced melee capabilities. Additional casts will raise the tuning level by 1 up to a maximum of 4.

VFECore.Abilities.AbilityDef.label: Summon Bishop I
VFECore.Abilities.AbilityDef.description: Hack a distant mechanoid factory to produce a Bishop I unit and skip it directly to you. Bandwidth Cost: 5

VFECore.Abilities.AbilityDef.label: Summon Rook I
VFECore.Abilities.AbilityDef.description: Hack a distant mechanoid factory to produce a Rook I unit and skip it directly to you. Bandwidth Cost: 8

VFECore.Abilities.AbilityDef.label: Summon Bishop II
VFECore.Abilities.AbilityDef.description: Hack a distant mechanoid factory to produce a Bishop II unit and skip it directly to you. Bandwidth Cost: 5

VFECore.Abilities.AbilityDef.label: Summon Rook II
VFECore.Abilities.AbilityDef.description: Hack a distant mechanoid factory to produce a Rook II unit and skip it directly to you. Bandwidth Cost: 8

VFECore.Abilities.AbilityDef.label: Summon Consul
VFECore.Abilities.AbilityDef.description: Hack a distant mechanoid factory to produce a Consul unit and skip it directly to you. Bandwidth Cost: 8

VFECore.Abilities.AbilityDef.label: Mi-Link
VFECore.Abilities.AbilityDef.description:
Link yourself to the target mechanoid, both parties will gain various bonuses.

Caster: Halved psyfocus and heat cost from psycasts

Mechanoid: Doubled consciousness and attack speed.

VFECore.Abilities.AbilityDef.label: Summon Striker
VFECore.Abilities.AbilityDef.description: Hack a distant mechanoid factory to produce a Striker unit and skip it directly to you. Bandwidth Cost: 10

VFECore.Abilities.AbilityDef.label: Summon Cardinal
VFECore.Abilities.AbilityDef.description: Hack a distant mechanoid factory to produce a Cardinal unit and skip it directly to you. Bandwidth Cost: 7

VFECore.Abilities.AbilityDef.label: Summon Eternal Fortress
VFECore.Abilities.AbilityDef.description: Hack a distant mechanoid factory to produce an Eternal Fortress unit and skip it directly to you. Bandwidth Cost: 12

VFECore.Abilities.AbilityDef.label: Tuning: Bishop
VFECore.Abilities.AbilityDef.description: Tune every owned mechanoid of the target's model to the Bishop class, increasing sight, manipulation and accuracy. Additional casts will raise the tuning level by 1 up to a maximum of 4.

VFECore.Abilities.AbilityDef.label: Tuning: Rook
VFECore.Abilities.AbilityDef.description: Tune every owned mechanoid of the target's model to the Rook class, reducing incoming damage. Additional casts will raise the tuning level by 1 up to a maximum of 4.
